title: [FTN-2] Validator can add more than one contract
summary: This bug report describes a problem with two functions called `ProcessDeposit()` and `appendValidatorContractsWithVal()`. The first function is responsible for adding new validators and their contracts, and it calls the second function to add a new contract to a validator. However, there is a problem where each validator can only have one contract tied to its address, and the second function does not check for this. This can cause issues when trying to add a new contract to a validator that already has one. The solution is to delete the old contract before adding a new one. This bug has been fixed.
